statements: SELECT * FROM PlayerData WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT username, score FROM PlayerData WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, username FROM PlayerData WHERE username LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM PlayerData WHERE INSTR(inventory, 'sword') > 0
SELECT username, score FROM PlayerData ORDER BY score ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM PlayerData WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT player_id, username FROM PlayerData WHERE inventory LIKE '%sword%' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, username, inventory FROM PlayerData WHERE inventory IS NOT NULL AND score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY player_id
SELECT username, inventory FROM PlayerData WHERE username = 'Alice' OR username = 'Bob' ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT player_id, score FROM PlayerData WHERE inventory LIKE '%potion%' AND score > 75 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT id, username, score, inventory FROM player_data;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, username FROM player_data WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'sword%';
SELECT id, username, score FROM player_data WHERE score < 50 ORDER BY score ASC, username DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_data WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT username, score FROM player_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND inventory->>'weapon' = 'sword';
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 10;

SELECT player_data.username, player_inventory.item_name, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_data JOIN player_inventory ON player_data.id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_inventory.item_name = 'Health Potion';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT username, score FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT item_name FROM items WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT players.username, items.item_name FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, score, jsonb_pretty(inventory) FROM players WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT players.username, items.item_name, player_items.quantity FROM players INNER JOIN player_items ON players.id = player_items.player_id INNER JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id;

SELECT DISTINCT players.username, items.item_name FROM players INNER JOIN player_items ON players.id = player_items.player_id INNER JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id WHERE player_items.quantity > 0;
SELECT players.username, SUM(player_items.quantity) AS total_items FROM players INNER JOIN player_items ON players.id = player_items.player_id GROUP BY players.username ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT username, score FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT player_id, health, level, experience FROM player_stats WHERE health < 50;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, score FROM players WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND inventory->>'sword' = 'true';
SELECT p.username, i.item_name, pi.quantity FROM players p JOIN player_items pi ON p.id = pi.player_id JOIN items i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id WHERE pi.quantity > 5 ORDER BY pi.quantity DESC;
SELECT p.username, ps.health, ps.level FROM players p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.id = ps.player_id WHERE ps.health < 50 OR ps.level > 10;
SELECT p.username, sum(pi.quantity) as total_items FROM players p JOIN player_items pi ON p.id = pi.player_id GROUP BY p.username HAVING total_items >= 20;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT id, username, score FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, level_name, completed FROM player_levels WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY level_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT item_name, item_description, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'weapon' LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, level_id, completed FROM player_levels WHERE completed = true ORDER BY level_id ASC
SELECT level_name, difficulty, high_score FROM levels WHERE difficulty = 'hard'
